66639.「ホッホッホッ。そういうことでしたか。: Hohoho... So that's what it meant, eh?

66640.「神代過ぎ～ 春の桜よ 無為に咲く～\n 清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く～。\n この:
"Past ages divine, the spring blossoms bloom, waiting idly by... Pure winds blow and trees grown, budding green as the breeze is thrown."
The word "thrown" in the song's second half is the key.

66641.「それが指すのは かつてのカミハルムイであり\n ５０年前に 打ち捨てられた\n:
It points to what was once Kamiharmui and the
throne of this castle, which was abandoned
fifty years ago.

66642.「さすが 王者にふさわしき <cs_pchero>殿。\n このバショオ 感服い:
Just as I'd expect from the Sovereign.
I, Basho, am quite impressed.

66643.「さあ 玉座を調べ 王都カミハルムイに伝わる\n 王者の武具への道を 開かれよ。:
Now, examine the throne. It will open the way
to the Sovereign's armor of Kamiharmui.

69762.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armor enveloped in a bright light descends
from high above...
